long_description: The Topeak DeFender iGlow is a sleek rear bike fender that's lighted to enhance safety in dim light while also doing its job protecting you from road spray and grime. Red 0.5-watt Super Bright LED features a constant and blinking mode; run time approximately 50 hrs. in constant and 100 hrs. in blinking. Quickly straps to all diameters of seat posts. Highly polished underside prevents dirt buildup and makes cleaning easy. The Topeak DeFender iGlow rear fender fits road tires up to 700 x 25C; includes 2 CR2032 batteries.
short_description: The Topeak DeFender iGlow is a sleek rear bike fender that's lighted to enhance safety in dim light while also doing its job protecting you from road spray and grime.
